analysis.content: functionupdatePrice()payable{if(msg.sender!=oraclize_cbAddress()){require(msg.value>=200finney);}if(oraclize_getPrice("URL")>this.balance){newOraclizeQuery("Oraclize query was NOT sent, please add some ETH to cover for the query fee");}else{newOraclizeQuery("Oraclize sent, wait..");oraclize_query(86400,"URL","json(https://min-api.cryptocompare.com/data/price?fsym=ETH&tsyms=USD).USD",220000);}}
